title: Funds Vesting in the President (Transfer) Act, 1973
title_en: Funds Vesting in the President (Transfer) Act, 1973
description: Official consolidated text of Funds Vesting in the President (Transfer) Act, 1973 (LX of 1973) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and commencement.⸻(1) This Act may be called the Funds Vesting in the
provisions.content:
President (Transfer) Act, 1973.
(2) It shall come into force at once.

provisions.title: Section 2. Vesting of Funds in Federal Government and their utilisation. ⸻(1) Notwithstanding
provisions.content:
anything contained in any other law or instrument, the Funds specified in the Schedule, together
with income and profits accruing thereon, shall vest in the Federal Government.
(2) The amounts in the aforesaid Funds shall be utilised for the purposes for which they
were raised or for purposes as similar thereto as the circumstances may permit.
[See section 2 (1)]
